content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) has a burner inserter and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill is connected to a belt group at position (x=40.5 y=-83.5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine is not found but there are transport belts at positions (x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Power generation structure at position (111, -32)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and another pipe group at position (x=105.5 y=-32.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment without fuel
- Make sure to provide fuel to burner equipment before using them
### Errors when using inserter without source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to use it
### Errors when using furnace without ingredients
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients before attempting to use it
### Errors when using steam engine without connection to the electric network
- Ensure the steam engine is connected to the electric network before attempting to use it
### Errors when using pipe without fluid
- Ensure the pipe has fluid to transport before attempting to use it

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
